channel.title: Client
channel.description: I jarred and signed my client, and it works fine when the person has the .class files somewhere on their computer I think, but when I give someone the .jar link and they download it, when they try to run it, it says "Could not find main class: client. Program will exit." How can I fix this?

item.title: Client
item.dc:creator: @oxygen1 oxygen-_
item.description:
@oxygen1 wrote:

delete every single class file in your client and re compile, then jar it and sign it again(you probably saved the settings so this shouldnt be hard)

Read full topic

item.title: Client
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

I jarred and signed my client, and it works fine when the person has the .class files somewhere on their computer I think, but when I give someone the .jar link and they download it, when they try to run it, it says “Could not find main class: client. Program will exit.” How can I fix this?
